docs.snippet: Croatia's Josip Simunic will miss the 2014 World Cup after the Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS) upheld FIFA's 10-match ban imposed on the defender for the pro-Nazi chants he made at the end of last year's playoff victory over Iceland....
docs.lead_paragraph: Croatia's Josip Simunic will miss the 2014 World Cup after the Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS) upheld FIFA's 10-match ban imposed on the defender for the pro-Nazi chants he made at the end of last year's playoff victory over Iceland.

headline.main: Simunic to Miss World Cup After CAS Upholds Ban
headline.print_headline: Simunic to Miss World Cup After CAS Upholds Ban

docs.snippet: American businessman Randy Lerner put Aston Villa up for sale on Monday after eight years in control of the Premier League club, saying he was drained by the "week-in, week-out battles."...
